statements: SELECT * FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships;
SELECT vendor_name, supplier_name FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE supplier_city = 'New York';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email, supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_city, vendor_city FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE vendor_city = 'San Francisco' AND supplier_city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_email, supplier_name FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE vendor_city <> supplier_city;
SELECT * FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE vendor_city = 'New York';
SELECT vendor_name, supplier_name FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE supplier_city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE vendor_city = 'Seattle' AND supplier_city = 'San Francisco';
SELECT DISTINCT vendor_city, supplier_city FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE vendor_city <> supplier_city;
SELECT vendor_name, supplier_name FROM Vendor_and_Supplier_Relationships WHERE vendor_city = 'Chicago' OR supplier_city = 'Miami' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_product = 'Electronics';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_product, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id > 100 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors v INNER JOIN suppliers s ON v.vendor_id = s.supplier_id WHERE v.vendor_name LIKE 'A%' AND s.supplier_location = 'New York'
SELECT MAX(vendor_id) AS max_id FROM vendors
SELECT * FROM suppliers s WHERE s.supplier_location IN ('Los Angeles', 'Chicago')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vendors FROM vendors
SELECT * FROM vendor;
SELECT name, email FROM vendor WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, contact_person FROM supplier WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM procurement WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor.name, supplier.name, procurement.amount FROM vendor JOIN procurement ON vendor.id = procurement.vendor_id JOIN supplier ON supplier.id = procurement.supplier_id;
SELECT id, name, email FROM vendor WHERE name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT id, name, email FROM vendor ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, email FROM supplier WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, name, email FROM vendor WHERE id = 1 OR id = 2
SELECT id, name, email FROM procurement WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, address FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, address FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price, vendor_name FROM products JOIN vendors ON products.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_name, quantity FROM purchase_orders JOIN products ON purchase_orders.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendor;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name, email FROM vendor ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product WHERE price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM procurement WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM vendor WHERE contact_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM product WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, pr.quantity FROM product p JOIN procurement pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id JOIN supplier s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT v.vendor_name, COUNT(p.product_id) AS total_products FROM vendor v JOIN product p ON v.vendor_id = p.vendor_id GROUP BY v.vendor_name HAVING total_products > 5;
